cause.description:
This cause is to raise alot and alot of money for cancer research because so many people are dieing a day.this cause hopes to find the cure to cancer research.
1. Helped us most of the way through this.
2. Helped us for some of the way through this.
3. Helped us a bit of the way through this.
cause.mission: Rise enough money to find the cure.
cause.name: Cancer research
